intro: This Model will combine data inputs on disease incidence and drug prices with health system-adapted treatment regimens developed and endorsed by international experts to generate estimates of the amount of chemotherapy needed and associated costs, by drug and disease.

required.list_intro: Required data to use the Model:
list_items: The chemotherapy regimen from among the Model’s included options that is most similar to the one used at your institution

optional.list_intro: Optional data (data can be input or modeled data can be used):
list_items: Percent of patients within each risk stratification group (based on cancer stage and other patient risk factors)
Price of each chemotherapy agent at your institution
